content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron plate factory at position(4, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 4.0, 0.0) with iron-ore (27) and coal (49) as fuel, currently smelting iron-plate.
- Stone furnace (position 2.0, 0.0) with iron-ore (20) and coal (49) as fuel, currently smelting iron-plate.
- Stone furnace (position 0.0, 0.0) with no ingredients to smelt and coal (8) as fuel.
- Stone furnace (position 6.0, 0.0) with no ingredients to smelt and coal (3) as fuel.

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
-  Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
-  Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
-  Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine
-  Beltgroup (position ) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace has available inventory space before attempting to insert items. The error occurred due to the furnace being full (50/50 items).

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. 

### Errors related to insufficient ingredients
- Check that the required ingredients are available in the inventory before attempting to smelt or craft.
